text: ēteṅkiluṁ strī tanṟe bharttāvil ninn piṇakkamēā avagaṇanayēā bhayappeṭṭāl avaran'yēān'yaṁ ottutīrppuṇṭākkunnatil kuṟṟamilla. ennalla; ottutīrppāṇ uttamaṁ. manuṣyamanas's eppēāḻuṁ saṅkucitamāyirikkuṁ. niṅṅaḷ nallanilayil kaḻiyukayuṁ sūkṣmata pularttukayumāṇeṅkil, ōrkkuka: allāhu niṅṅaḷ ceyyunnavayeākkeyuṁ sūkṣmamāyi aṟiyunnavanāṇ
